text: Norbert Kerckhove (21 October 1932 - 4 July 2006) was a Belgian professional racing cyclist. He won the E3 Harelbeke in 1959. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1932 births Category:2006 deaths Category:Belgian male cyclists Category:People from Meulebeke Category:Tour de France cyclists Category:Sportspeople from West Flanders
title: Norbert Kerckhove
